column2: We have been defeated on the Italian Peninsula. Forced to return to Aragon in shame, we must quickly forge a new path and begin a crusade against the Castalian in Madrid, forging a new Iberian path §R Taking this decision will BLOCK the formation of Aragon-Italy.

With our conquest of the Emerald Isle, We can now integrate Ireland as a formal part of the Kalmar Union just as we did Scotland returning to the Island we abandoned in 902.\n§RTaking this decision will lock you out of getting Elbian accepted and cored.§!
With the integration of the Croations into the crown of San Stefen we now have the manpower to launch an offensive against the Turks to liberate the former lands of the Kingdom of Serbia.
